item.title: 【Cinema Center】MOVIE - Go.Figure.2005.1080p.DSNP.WEB-DL.DDP5.1.H.264-Samuel
item.description:
Go Figure

Alternate Artwork 1 | Alternate Artwork 2 | Alternate Artwork 3 | Alternate Artwork 4 | Alternate Artwork 5 | Key Art


2005 • 1h 29m
Sports, Coming of Age

Description
Fourteen-year-old Katelin Kingsford has given everything to become a world champion figure skater. Luckily, she encounters a renowned Russian figure skating coach who offers to take her to the next level, but with a catch: Katelin must join the girls' hockey team to obtain a scholarship to the school. Can the graceful Katelin score points in the rough-and-tumble world of hockey?
Click to expand...
Trailers
Click to expand...
More Information
Long Description:
Fourteen-year-old Katelin Kingsford has dedicated every moment of her life to the fiercely competitive world of figure skating. When renowned Russian figure skating coach Natasha Goberman offers Katelin a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to train at the private academy where she teaches, Katelin will sacrifice anything and everything. What she doesn't understand is why she must join the girls' hockey team to obtain the only scholarship to the school. She also has to keep her figure skating aspirations a secret from her teammates, who make fun of "twirl girls." Can the graceful Katelin score points in the rough-and-tumble world of hockey?
Duration: 1h 29m
Release Date: 2005
Genre: Sports, Coming of Age
Rating:
Director: Francine McDougall
Starring: Jordan Hinson, Whitney Sloan, Christine Rose, Ryan Malgarini, Tania Gunadi, Amy Halloran

item.author: Samuel

item.title: 【UPSCALED】Queen - A Kind Of Magic (Remastered) [4K AI Upscale | HEVC 10-bit | PCM 24-bit 96 kHz | DTS 24/96 5.1]
item.description:
Genre: Rock
Style: Arena Rock
Year: 1986
Video Source: YouTube, 1440p remaster
Audio Source: SACD & DVD

"A Kind of Magic" is the title track of the 1986 album of the same name by the British rock band Queen. It was written by the band's drummer, Roger Taylor, for the film Highlander and featured as the ending theme. The single reached number three in the UK Singles Chart, top ten in a number of European countries, and #42 on the US Billboard Hot 100. The song is the opening track on the band's compilation albums, Greatest Hits II, and Classic Queen.
Brian May described this original version as "quite lugubrious and heavy". For the album version, Freddie Mercury created a new bass line, added instrumental breaks, and changed the song's order to make it more chart friendly. Mercury and David Richards produced this new version.

The phrase "a kind of magic" is used in Highlander by Connor MacLeod (Christopher Lambert) as a description of his immortality. Roger Taylor liked the phrase so much that he used it as inspiration for the song. There are references to the film in the lyrics: "one prize, one goal"; "no mortal man"; and "there can be only one". The single's cover art features an image of Clancy Brown in character as the film's villain, The Kurgan.

The music video for this song was directed by Russell Mulcahy, director of Highlander. Notable is that Brian May did not use his famous Red Special guitar in the music video, but instead a 1984 copy. In the video, Mercury is dressed as a magician type figure. He enters an abandoned theatre (The Playhouse Theatre in London) where May, Taylor and John Deacon (all dressed as stereotypical tramps) are asleep until awakened by Mercury's entrance. Mercury transforms the hobos into the Queen members, dressed regularly with their instruments, then back to hobos again as he leaves. Throughout the video, cartoon images dance to the beat of the song which were produced by The Walt Disney Company.
In June 2022 a 1440p/50fps remaster was released on YouTube. It is remastered from the original 1-inch / 2-inch videotape masters by James Wong.

Release Info
The video track is upscaled to from 1440p to 4K with Topaz Video AI and encoded to HEVC 10-bit.
The first PCM track is the 2012 remaster ripped from the SACD release, synced with Adobe Audition.
The second PCM track + the DTS track are ripped from the Greatest Video Hits 2 DVD, synced by muxing.
The timed lyrics are created from scratch. Enable the subtitles to see the lyrics.

Code:
General
Unique ID                      : 277585971580730425173112396466754865828 (0xD0D51D0D15D3ECC8FE81BA29E322CAA4)
Complete name                  : Queen - A Kind Of Magic (Remastered).mkv
Format                         : Matroska
Format version                 : Version 4 / Version 2
File size                      : 476 MiB
Duration                       : 4 min 19 s
Overall bit rate               : 15.4 Mb/s
Frame rate                     : 50.000 FPS
Encoded date                   : 2023-09-15 22:47:35 UTC
Writing application            : mkvmerge v76.0 ('Celebration') 64-bit
Writing library                : libebml v1.4.4 + libmatroska v1.7.1

Video

Codec ID                       : V_MPEGH/ISO/HEVC
